title: PCA & Pattern discovery
description: Hey guys! In the subsequent kernel I am using the PCA algorithm in order to gain further insights into the various atom-configurations contained in the xyz-files. I hope that this might be a help for you in order to explore new features which advance you in the underlying problem statement. I like to add that I am not a domain expert in the chemistry field.
